attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the beginning of our current New Labour Government, many people's lives have improved for the better. Mine, however, is considerably worse now than ever before. This is due to the nuisance Toobler's Bar causes myself, my pets and my neighbours. Anchorman is repeated constantly until the early hours of the morning, and quite frankly I've had enough. It's time to end the tyranny of Toobler's.

rejection.details: We would suggest that you contact your local authority about noise nuisance issues.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
